name: drafts-mcp-server
description: MCP server for interacting with the Drafts app on macOS
long_description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that enables AI assistants to interact with the Drafts app on macOS through AppleScript. Manage drafts, workspaces, tags, and run actions programmatically.

tools.name: drafts_get_tag
tools.description: Get a tag and its associated drafts

tools.name: drafts_get_current_workspace
tools.description: Get the current workspace in Drafts

tools.name: drafts_get_current
tools.description: Get the current draft open in Drafts

tools.name: drafts_get_workspace_drafts
tools.description: Get drafts from a specific workspace, optionally filtered by folder

tools.name: drafts_get_drafts
tools.description: Get drafts with flexible filtering by content, folder, tag, flagged status, and dates

tools.name: drafts_create_draft
tools.description: Create a new draft with content and optional tags

tools.name: drafts_get_draft
tools.description: Get a specific draft by its UUID

tools.name: drafts_update_draft
tools.description: Update the content of an existing draft

tools.name: drafts_add_tags
tools.description: Add tags to an existing draft

tools.name: drafts_search
tools.description: Search for drafts using a query string

tools.name: drafts_run_action
tools.description: Run a Drafts action on a specific draft

tools.name: drafts_list_actions
tools.description: List all available actions in Drafts

tools.name: drafts_open
tools.description: Open a draft in the Drafts editor
